outline:
1. height
    1. height, elevation, elevated place
      1. in a high place (adv)
    2. height
    3. proudly (adv)
    4. of nobles (fig.)
kjv_def: (far) above, dignity, haughty, height, (most, on) high (one, place), loftily, upward.
strongs_def: altitude, i.e. concretely (an elevated place), abstractly (elevation, figuratively (elation), or adverbially (aloft)
